ch0004_90_toko/0101_0701_02_10:
You’ve gotta meet every battle head-on!
Let’s get fired up today!
ch0004_90_toko/7101_0701_01_10:
I never thought I’d be able to battle beside a
Pokémon from the future!
ch0004_90_toko/7101_0701_02_10:
I guess there must be loads of encounters
I can’t even imagine still waiting out there
for me!
ch0004_90_toko/7102_0701_01_10:
Whether I win or lose, as long as I had fun,
I have no complaints!
ch0004_90_toko/7102_0701_02_10:
Even if I lose, it teaches me how to be
stronger, and I think that’s fun!
ch0004_90_toko/7102_0701_03_10:
Let’s aim to be the best! Keep putting
one foot in front of the other, and head
toward the future!
ch0004_90_toko/7103_0701_01_10:
Bianca and Cheren—and Nate and Rosa—
stood on the same stage I did!
ch0004_90_toko/7103_0701_02_10:
I’m gonna keep getting stronger until I’m the
TOP Neo Champion!
ch0004_90_toko/7104_0701_01_10:
People and Pokémon aren’t the only things
that change with time. Cities and scenery
change, too!
ch0004_90_toko/7104_0701_02_10:
I wonder if Unova looks different now
compared to the last time I saw it.
ch0004_90_toko/7104_0701_03_10:
Hey, why don’t we hang out in Unova
together?
ch0004_90_toko/7105_0701_01_10:
I’m a Neo Champion now, which means I
have to be a role model!
ch0004_90_toko/7105_0701_02_10:
So, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Let’s get out there and have some
serious battles!
ch0004_90_toko/7105_0701_03_10: We’ll show Pasio how we battle!
ch0004_90_toko/7105_0701_04_10:
I won’t let you leave until you’ve shown us
everything you’ve got!
ch0004_90_toko/1701_0701_01_10:
I have something I wanted to give you.
Here—it’s all yours!
ch0004_90_toko/1701_0702_01_10: Let’s both keep getting stronger, OK?
ch0004_90_toko/2501_0701_01_10:
Paradox Pokémon, from the future...
How far into the future are they from?
ch0004_90_toko/2501_0701_02_10: I bet people in the future look different, too!
ch0004_90_toko/2501_0701_03_10:
That said, I’m sure no matter how much we
change, the relationship between people and
Pokémon won’t!
ch0004_90_toko/2501_0702_01_10: I’ll keep getting older, until I’m an adult...
ch0004_90_toko/2501_0702_02_10:
I hope even then I can be friends with my
Pokémon!
ch0004_90_toko/2511_0701_01_10:
Iron Leaves can split boulders with the
sharp blades on its neck and forehead!
ch0004_90_toko/2511_0701_03_10:
And the more powerful a Pokémon, the more
skilled its Trainer has to be, too!
ch0004_90_toko/2511_0702_01_10:
I wonder what I’ll be like in the future! You
think by then I’ll be the strongest Trainer?
ch0004_90_toko/2511_0702_02_10:
I guess it’s all up to how hard I work
now, huh?
ch0004_90_toko/2511_0702_03_10:
All right! I’m gonna get even stronger and
be the best Trainer ever!
ch0004_90_toko/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Ready to jump into our first battle
of the day?
ch0004_90_toko/3003_0701_01_10:
Come with me! Whether we’re battling or
having fun, we’re gonna go all out!
ch0004_90_toko/3005_0701_01_10:
We had a lot of battles today, huh? We’d
better wrap it up...with one last battle!
